Summary: Dear John Doe, thank you for choosing our relocation services! We're thrilled to assist you with your move to Austin. Agent Sarah Miller will be your dedicated relocation specialist, and she will be in touch shortly to discuss your specific needs and preferences. We've begun identifying suitable housing options for you, considering your preference for a furnished apartment, and we'll send you a selection of properties within the next 24-48 hours. We look forward to working with you!
